about.title: About me
about.content1: Full-Stack Web Developer, fan of programming who love hard challenges. I love working on team and learn new things every single day. As an elite athlete, I donâ€™t fear hard-work, and I am perseverant and disciplined
about.content2: Like I did as athlete, I started run when I was 37 years old, I also started a bit late to code, although I always like code and computers but I've had to work in others fields.
about.content3: But I always try to do my best in everything I do, I am committed to my work and I like things well done.
